translation.name: AI Customer Service
translation.welcomeMessage: Hello, how can I help you today?
translation.ingestDesc: Please select the file to be imported
translation.ingestIntentionDesc: Please select the imported file to create intention
translation.selectFileDesc: After the file is successfully uploaded, the ingestion process will begin.
translation.deleteTips: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item?
translation.executionDetailDesc: Please check the file list below, and click the info icon for more details.
translation.detailNoFiles: No files or please waiting execution to complete
translation.indexComment: Please separate multiple indexes with a comma.
translation.qaListDesc: Here is a list of questions uploaded in this batch.
translation.promptCreateTips: New prompt will override current prompt, are you sure to continue?
translation.promptDeleteTips: Delete the prompt will reset to the system default prompt.
translation.chatbotCreateTips: New chatbot will override the current chatbot, are you sure to continue?
translation.chatbotDeleteTips: Delete the chatbot will reset to the system default chatbot.
translation.intentionDeleteTips: Delete these executions will delete all the relative data in the system.
translation.toAvoidTips: To avoid accidental deletions we ask you to provide additional written consent.
translation.deleteAlert: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
translation.deleteIntentionFailed: These data could not be deleted because it is being used by other indexes.
translation.indexListDesc: Here is a list of indexes of this chatbot.
translation.defaultIndexDesc: Answer question based on search result
translation.chatbotNameDesc: The unique identifier of the robot space, it must not duplicate with any existing ones.
translation.modelDesc: Used for text vectorization in the robot space.
translation.indexUsedByBot: This index is already used by other users
translation.indexUsedByModel: This index is already associated with other embedding models

button.login: Log in to AI Customer Service

header.reSignInDesc: You have logged out of your account. Please click 'Reload' to log in to the web console again

validation.requireModel: Please select or input a model
validation.repeatChatbotName: Chatbot name is already used, please change the name
validation.repeatIndex: This index is already used, please change the index
validation.requireMaxTokens: Please enter a maximum number of tokens
validation.temperatureRange: The temperature must be between 0 and 1
validation.maxTokensRange: The maximum number of tokens must lager than 0
validation.formatInvalidTagIndex: Only letters, numbers, -, and _ are allowed
validation.indexNameEmpty: Index name can not be empty.
validation.indexValid: Index is used by other model, please change index name
validation.defaultIndexValid: Default index is used by other model, please customize index name
validation.repeatedIndexName: The index is duplicated with a previous entry, please modify it

translation.subTitle: Streamlined Workflow for Building Agent-Based Applications
translation.projectDescription: AI Customer Service offers a streamlined workflow for developing scalable, production-grade agent-based applications

feat1.name: Enterprise Knowledge Base Construction
feat1.desc: Its data preprocessing module includes format recognition, content extraction, metadata conversion, and semantic segmentation, seamlessly in the background.

feat2.name: Flexible Mode Options
feat2.desc: The following graph is generated by online logic which is built based on LangGraph. The first node is query_preprocess_lambda which handles the chat history. Then the user can choose from three modes: chat, rag and agent. The chat mode lets you interact directly with different LLMs, such as Anthropic Claude 3
